name: cogen
typ: Cogen a => a -> Gen b -> Gen b

name: function_

name: depfun_

name: dargfun_
typ: {0 b : a -> Type} -> Cogen (b x) => Gen c -> Gen (b x -> c)

name: dargdepfun_

name: FSum

name: via

name: function'
